title: CNES Set to Test Fire Upgraded Ariane 6 Booster
summary:
The French space agency CNES has transported the first P160C solid rocket booster to its test stand ahead of a planned test firing. The booster is intended to replace the P120C booster currently utilized by both the Ariane 6 and Vega C launch systems. ESA announced in March 2022 that it would begin developing an […]
The post CNES Set to Test Fire Upgraded Ariane 6 Booster appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Martian rock on the move
summary: This new snapshot from the European Space Agency’s Mars Express deftly captures the two distinct faces of Mars: ridged and rugged versus smooth and unmarked.

summary:
